summary: This document is a letter from Wilmer Cutler Pickering Hale and Dorr LLP, representing JPMorgan Chase, requesting confidential treatment for materials related to grand jury subpoenas. The letter outlines the reasons for confidentiality under the Freedom of Information Act and discusses the potential harm of public disclosure of the materials.

persons.name: Anjan Sahni
persons.context: Anjan Sahni is mentioned as the recipient of the letter regarding the grand jury subpoenas issued to JPMorgan Chase.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoenas Issued
events.description: Grand jury subpoenas were issued to JPMorgan Chase Bank and its affiliates.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoenas Issued
events.description: Additional grand jury subpoenas were issued to JPMorgan Chase.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoenas Issued
events.description: Further grand jury subpoenas were issued to JPMorgan Chase.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoenas Issued
events.description: Grand jury subpoenas were issued to JPMorgan Chase Bank and all affiliates.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document requests confidential treatment for materials related to grand jury subpoenas issued to JPMorgan Chase.
The letter cites potential competitive harm to JPMorgan from public disclosure of the materials.
It references multiple dates of grand jury subpoenas issued in 2019.
The document discusses exemptions under the Freedom of Information Act that apply to the requested materials.
Anjan Sahni is the Assistant United States Attorney addressed in the correspondence.
